materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a Gautama Buddha statue. The seated Buddha statue has crossed legs, with the left hand in the lap, and right hand pointing to the ground with the palm facing inward. The seat is a carved decorated seat. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Gautama Buddha statue
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Gautama Buddha Statues
